Package com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MenuBuilder<T extends Menu,E extends BuildMenuEvent<T>>
    Takes care of menu assembly.
    MenuItemBuilderProcessor
    Processor instance to modify menu items after they have been built, but before having been attached to a parent item.
    MenuMatcher  
    MenuSelector
    A MenuSelector is a strategy interface that searches a Menu tree and returns at most one Menu item that matches it.
    MenuStore
    Stores all created menus.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FixedMenuOrderComparator
    Registers a fixed order to menu paths that are equal.
    Menu
    Represents a hierarchical menu (tree) structure.
    MenuFactory  
    MenuMatchers  
    MenuMatchers.PathEqualityMenuMatcher  
    MenuMatchers.PathPatternMenuMatcher  
    OrderComparatorWrapper
    Wraps around another comparator to first compare based on explicit order value set, but if the order value is the same, the secondary comparator will be used.
    PathBasedMenuBuilder
    A PathBasedMenuBuilder can be used to define menu items in a non-hierarchical way.
    PathBasedMenuBuilder.PathBasedMenuItemBuilder
    Represents a single item builder attached to a parent PathBasedMenuBuilder.
    PrefixContextMenuItemBuilderProcessor
    Applies a prefix context to a newly create menu item: applies the prefix to the url and creates an extra matcher for the prefix path.
    RequestMenuBuilder<T extends Menu,E extends BuildMenuEvent<T>>
    Builds a menu and assigns the request path to the selected path.
    RequestMenuSelector
    Will search a menu for the item that best matches with the requested url.
    RequestMenuStore
    Stores Menu instance as attribute on the request, under the name specified.
    TraversingMenuSelector
    Simple implementation of MenuSelector that will iterate over all items in a menu tree and find the lowest item that matches.
